title: Jottacloud

md5_memory_limit.title: MD5 Memory Limit
md5_memory_limit.description: Files bigger than this will be cached on disk to calculate the MD5 if required

trashed_only.title: Trashed Only
trashed_only.description: Only show files that are in the trash. This will show trashed files in their original directory structure

hard_delete.title: Hard Delete
hard_delete.description: Delete files permanently rather than putting them into the trash

upload_resume_limit.title: Upload Resume Limit
upload_resume_limit.description: Files bigger than this can be resumed if the upload fails

no_versions.title: No Versions
no_versions.description: Avoid server side versioning by deleting files and recreating files instead of overwriting them

$comment: Jottacloud uses OAuth authentication. The device, mountpoint, and token fields are managed by rclone during OAuth flow
